chapter.title: Data Values
chapter.para: Orc's expressible values are primarily those returned from site calls. However, Orc supplies a few primitive value types and some structured value types.

Orc has conventional Boolean, numeric, and string literals, and a unit type with the literal signal. Orc's built-in structured value types are list, tuple, record, and algebraic datatypes. The Orc standard library provides other value types, including mutable values.
